application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 7 (Professional management of engineering works) and 8 (Protection of trees during construction) of planning permission 22/06231 (Erection of rear single-storey extension, infilling raised terrace at lower ground floor level, removal of non-original extensions at raised ground floor level and erection of replacement single-storey, lightweight, glazed extension, erection of basement below and part of rear garden, erection of single-storey pavilion to rear garden, enlargement of bay window to rear elevation at second floor level, addition of 2 dormer windows to rear main roof slope and 2 rooflights to front main roof slope, erection of lightweight, glazed canopy to side passage entrance).
